T02D3093:188a-1: 'khrul 'khor snga ma ltar brgyad byas te /
T02D3093:188a-2: tha mar ser ba'i 'byung po m'a ra ya bandha ya nan /
T02D3093:188a-3: bya ba bkod nas bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor byas nas /
T02D3093:188a-4: phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis bkug bcings nas /
T02D3093:188a-5: kham phor ram thod par bcug nas /
T02D3093:188a-6: bsrung bar bya ba'i yul gyi phyogs mtshams bzhir dong gru gsum du snga ma ltar mnan te /
T02D3093:188a-7: tsha tsha btabs nas mchod rten brgyad byas te /
T02D3093:188a-8: de gzungs 'di bris te mchod cing bskor ba byas nas gzhag ba dang /
T02D3093:188a-9: yungs kar la sngags 'bum la sogs pa bzlas te gzhag pa dang /
T02D3093:188b-0: gzhan du yang @188b bskor ba dang tshangs pa la sogs pa la gtor ma byin te /
T02D3093:188b-5: yul de'i lha dang klu la sogs pa la mchod
T02D3093:188b-6: pa dang gtor mas tshim par byas nas gsol ba
T02D3093:188b-7: gdab bo // de nas gzungs la rtag tu mchod cing bzlas pa dang /
T02D3093:188b-8: skabs su mchod pa dang gtor ma gtang zhing sprin
T02D3093:188b-9: la sogs pa byung ba'i tshe bdag nyid lha'i nga
T02D3093:188b-10: rgyal byas te thams cad 'joms pa bzlas shing yungs
T02D3093:188b-11: kar dang bcas pa nam mkha' thams cad phyag rgya'i
T02D3093:188b-12: tshogs kyis gdabs 'joms par bsam mo //
